name: The House of PUNK
description:
This game requires 2 people to play. Uses the same keyboard. 

A simple 2 player game for this weeks game jam - topic: Punks not Dead.

The game is a 2 player fighting game where a priest like player and a punk man fight to the death, including two levels, the church and a rock concert. 

Each player has two attacks, kicking and punching.
